note.p: Artist and writer. Exhibited portraits in the Royal Academy of Arts in London from 1838 to 1842. Emigrated from England to the Owenite community of New Harmony, Indiana, in 1850. Wrote an extensive series of radical articles for the Boston Investigator.
Clark Kimberling, "John Chappellsmith (1805–1895), artist and writer, 〈http://faculty.evansville.edu/ck6/bstud/jchapp.html〉
